SOLUTION:
"The game settings are missing or out-of-date"

To anyone who is having this problem, THE SOLUTION IS SIMPLE. This message appears because you don't have the Microsoft .NET Framework 3.5 
All you have to do is to look for it and install and the game shall work correcly just like it worked here too. 
When you solve the problem, please send a e-mail to me, so that I can know I helped you. Thank you
